decr: Your brothers are fighting a battle against the Philistines. They tell you that there's a giant on the enemy's side. Everybody else is scared. Should you fight the giant(1), or not? (2)
King Saul finds you and asks you to try on his armor. Do it (1) or get your own stuff (2)
You go back home and your side loses
Saul's armor doesn't fit.  You take it off.
